nodes.text: Lady Landric was the wife of Moff Landric of Emmo sector during the Galactic Civil War. While staying on Elshandruu Pica, Lady Landric had gems and settings worth six million credits stolen from her safe at Margath's by the Tombat. After promising a full Imperial investigation into the theft, the Tombat mysteriously returned the items two days later. The theft led to her husband pressuring the Imperial Office of Criminal Investigations to assign a Special Enforcement Officer, Zanza Gata, to head the Tombat investigation.
